channel.title: What The Fuck?
channel.description:
I swear I am cursed. I cannot stay healthy for more than 4 weeks. Yes, I did quit football, but, I decided to finish the season off. So today being game day, Saturday, we were playing. If anyone knows me pretty well they will know that I am an extremely fierce competitor. I always give my 110% in everything, in football, I put my body on the line, in Motocross, I put my life on the line.
Anyway, it was getting close to the end, and I was still trying my heart out, regardless of how stuffed I was. And I was head highed, very, very, very, badly. I slammed my head into the ground and blacked out for about 2 seconds. I woke up and played the ball, then layed down, acting very strangely. I do not remember any of it, apart from what I have been told. I wasn't knocked out though which is the strange part.
I somehow finished the game, regardless of how swollen my knee was, how much I was dizzy, how bloody my mouth was and last but not least, not knowing what the hell I was doing. So anywho, I had to walk home as we walked to the game because the field was just down the road. On the way home, I threw up.
Sorry if it seems I make so many posts like this, but it's the only thing I have to talk about. All you people can talk about making a game in Java and stuff.

item.title: What The Fuck?
item.dc:creator: @Dylza Dylza
item.description:
@Dylza wrote:

Woah pretty bad man, This Australian Football?

item.title: What The Fuck?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:11, topic:125685”]Racer, play in a Sunday league club. Saturday leagues are for nubs

Anyway, I think it’s time you began to live each day as your last :P[/quote]
Sunday’s race day …

Read full topic

item.title: What The Fuck?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

.Flair:

Take a break for a couple weeks and just excerise in your room and take walks in the morning at night, it’s a good break from all your sports.

lol how do you take walks in the morning at night? :S =D

I am not a sporting person at my school before it closed down i swear we had an ambulance on our playing field nearly every 2 weeks.

item.title: What The Fuck?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

I’ve never actually been knocked out, nor broken a bone, nor got stitches. Yes, I do go outside. I have gotten my bell rang a couple times in hockey though, but nothing that I couldn’t play with by the end of the game.

Read full topic

item.title: What The Fuck?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Bebemycat2:

I took a field hockey ball to the temple… very painful when I “woke up”. Plus I had a concussion and couldn’t practice for 3 days, so I wasn’t eligible for the next game

Ouch!

item.description:

that would’ve sucked, something like this happened to me last year, but i didnt black out, there was this massive guy we were vsing(tall not fat)i tried to tackle him and i tripped, 4 people ran on me and one tripped over my head
